CustomField.description: Indicates that this product should not have an activation line itself, but is connected to a specific activation line during activation.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Does this product require activation, but is it linked to another activation line during activation rather than having a line by itself? Often for products such as VAS' or SLA's. Requires "Activation record type" to be set.
CustomField.label: Activate with other products
